comments.comments_text: David Raum (RB Leipzig) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it. RB Leipzig have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.

comments.comments_text: The defending players give Xavi Simons (RB Leipzig) far too much free space and he knows how to take advantage of it. He produces a howitzer in the direction of the top right corner. Omri Glazer was taken unawares by his effort and the score is 2:0.
